nel.name: Nel
nel.title: Stoic Dragon
nel.description: A child of the Fell Dragon from another Elyos. She is Rafal's elder sister and very much his counterpart. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: The Fell Dragon's children are always twins. In rare cases, there are defects with two souls born into one body.
In the world I come from, Emblems dwelled in bracelets instead of rings. I had the power to put them to sleep.
You appear tired, Summoner. Might I sing you to sleep with a lullaby? I will not stay to wake you, but...
Rafal shared my life and dragonstone. No matter what anyone says, we are truly two halves of the same whole.
The meals mortals eat seem bland. I often add hot or sour spices, though I get the strangest looks for doing so.
Visit: Please, give my regards to the Divine Dragon and accept this greeting from [F].
Level: If this benefits the Order of Heroes, then I accept it.
This is a mere moment. I will not be the one who decides my worth.
Things do not always go well.
Summon: I am Nel. I cannot believe I am the one being called upon for aid. Where are the Divine Dragon and Rafal?
Learn Skill: I promise to protect this world with the power bestowed upon me so it does not follow a path to destruction.
Confession:
You were summoning again, I see. Did you find the power you hoped for?
I performed a summoning ceremony once in my grief over the world's destruction and got but one savior.
You can summon so many Heroes. I understand this is because of how great of a threat this world faces.
If that is the case, even if the Order of Heroes' courtyard is full of Heroes, I shall do my best to become a savior.
I will not allow you to witness your world's annihilation or lose those who are precious to you, as I did.
Status: Hmm...
Divine One? Oh...no. Of course, it is only you.
I am a Fell Dragon. Does it not frighten you to get close to me?
The power to put Emblems to sleep... Having crossed to another world yet again, it has still been denied me.
I fought alongside the savior of my world to collect the seven Emblem bracelets.
I will not die again knowing there is someone who waited a thousand years for me the first time.
Wherever Rafal is now, I hope he is not lonely, being apart like this...
The Heroes here ask that you look after yourself, so that you always make it back from the battlefield. That is my wish, as well.
Map Select: Let us be on our way.

rafal.name: Rafal
rafal.title: Atoning Dragon
rafal.description: A child of the Fell Dragon from another Elyos. He is Nel's younger brother and very much her counterpart. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: Tell me of the sweets of this world. But omit the mild sweets! I desire what most would say is TOO sweet.
My father cast a spell on me, and I ended up doing...unforgivable things. Those sins are all mine to bear.
I could awaken Emblems in my world. Yet in having traversed worlds twice, I seem to have lost the power.
Allow me to take on your...unsavory missions. I am expendable, unlike my sister, the Divine Dragon, and the rest.
If Divine Dragon Lumera is here, I will be curious to learn what it was like to await a loved one for a millennium...
Visit:
I come with greetings on behalf of [F].
I also come with some of my sweet treats, specially made to suit average palates.
Level: The expected result. But I can do more.
No... I will not be a failure...
Summon: I am Rafal, and I bring with me the power of the Fell Dragon's lineage. Is it possible...my sister Nel is here?
Learn Skill: You choose to grant me power... Very well. I may return the favor.
Confession:
Summoner, I applaud your deft use of my power. I wish to reward you by speaking about myself and my past.
For a long time, I took the place of one named Nil, who was the true twin of Nel. I looked for Nil here, yet...
Only those who have done great deeds, whether good or evil, will be brought here as a Hero.
Nil's deeds were, sadly, insufficient. Meanwhile, my great deeds were... apocalyptic.
But evil pawns can still do good if wielded well. Thus, thanks to you, I now fight on behalf of the slain.
I believe I shall spend this evening watching the stars. Nil always did like looking at the stars...
If you have no other plans, would you join me, [S]?
Status: Your attempts at altruism remind me of the Divine Dragon...
Do not cling to me! Shall I take on my Fell Dragon form?
The power to awaken Emblems is of no use in Askr.
Only the sweetest of confections can satisfy me.
Nel... My sister is my precious counterpart. She always will be, no matter how many thousands of years pass by.
Neither the seven bracelets nor my father's power are necessary now.
Huh? You'll be taking a nap? And would like me to wake you?! Ugh! How dare you. I am not some blithering rooster!

yunaka.name: Yunaka
yunaka.title: Hidden Mask
yunaka.description: A wanderer who travels Elyos. She keeps a tight lid on the details of her past. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: Anna seems to like me since I said I could tell a product's authenticity. I wonder what she'll have me do.
Tales from my past? I can't say I remember any! Besides, I'm one of your Heroes now. Is...that enough?
I want to live a just and pure life. But I will eliminate—I mean, I won't forgive anyone who threatens you.
I'll never get sick of this courtyard! All these unusual things— Oh! Look at that person's gleaming sword!
The southern freecat at my feet came with me! Maybe because I was just at the farmyard in the Somniel...
Visit:
I, Yunaka, have a hiya papaya to deliver from [F].
Keep up the good relations, you two!
Level: Zappy! Look how far I've come!
A death sentence for the enemy!
We can laugh this one off, right?
Summon: It's hiya papaya to meet you! Call me Yunaka. Seeing as you've summoned me, I'll be sure to be useful.
Learn Skill: I'm ever so honored to receive this valuable gift! From now on, I'll prove even more useful!
Confession:
That was some mighty fine leadership in today's battle! Did you fight like that in the world you came from?
I bet you were always this powerful— Oh? You never set foot on a battlefield or summoned anyone?
If you obtained all this power here, then people really can change... I, too, want to be a new Yunaka in Askr!
At least...enough to atone for my past sins as an assassin...
Oh, uh... I was just talking to myself. Not to worry! I'll see you in battle! I look forward to lots of hiya papayas!
Status: Zappy!
Have you seen Emblem Micaiah around? Just curious.
Ooo, what kind of weapon is that?! The grip is so distinctive. I've never seen anything like it!
Hiya papaya! I'm here to have a good time.
Truth is, I'm just a wandering nobody. "Hero" is overselling it.
Did you know some of these Heroes are assassins?! I couldn't believe it either!
Any one of these Heroes could be a threat. I can't afford to let my guard down.
Got an impression for you. Wanna hear it? OK, here goes. *ahem* "If there's one thing I'm really good at, it's lighting up the room!"

zelestia.name: Zelestia
zelestia.title: Loving Leader
zelestia.description: Leader of the Four Winds. A scion and last survivor of the Mage Dragons, she is rich in love and affection for her companions. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: I think I might be hungry. The last time I ate was... Um... Ugh! I forgot to eat again. Always so much to do!
The Four Winds lost a member. Still, no matter where we are, I believe the four of us will always be together.
It is a bit chilly here, isn't it? You can sit closer if you like. Mage Dragons have a high body temperature.
How moving to see Lumera and Alear talking as they did in my world, back when they both still lived.
My magic may be weak among Mage Dragons, but I won't complain. I will still protect everyone as best I can.
Visit: I took great care to deliver you this warm and thoughtful greeting from your friend [F]!
Level: I want to achieve strength befitting my role as leader of the Four Winds.
Even the smallest changes fill my heart with joy!
Odd. I'm still young for a Mage Dragon. I should be improving faster.
Summon: Did you summon me, Zelestia, leader of the Four Winds? Then, I am happy to make your acquaintance!
Learn Skill: Oh my, thank you. I am touched by this gesture!
Confession:
Welcome home! You must have had a difficult day full of missions, patrols, and summoning.
Oh? Was "welcome home" an unusual way to greet you?
But the Order of Heroes is home. It is a family of sorts, like the Four Winds that I have long been a part of.
We take on different roles within that family—parents, siblings, children— but you are clearly the head of it.
I'd like to be a mother figure, though it is presumptuous to claim that title, or a needy child from time to time.
I shall support you with unconditional love, so keep coming home healthy, all right, [S]?
Status: Yes?
I am Zelestia, leader of the Four Winds. I will fight for the Divine Dragon, even in this world.
Ooh! *giggle* Oh! That tickled. *giggle* Should you surprise me in that way again, I shall return the favor.
Mage Dragons have a high body temperature. Feel free to stand closer if you're cold.
Oh, I forgot to make time for a meal again. I suppose I should make up for it.
I lost someone important to me in my world... Please, do not leave me like that.
Even if we are apart, the Four Winds will always be together. Even Mauvier.
The Order of Heroes is like a family. I can see myself enduring even the most difficult of battles so I may return here.

griss.name: Griss
griss.title: Indulging Pain
griss.description: Second-in-command of the Four Hounds, he is a dangerous villain filled with madness, more fond of pain than anything else. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: Ugh, "hello" is so boring! Cut me with blades, crush me with magic! Doesn't that sound like a better introduction?
I will follow you, Lord Sombron! Give me blood! Show me hell! Stab me into your enemy's heart like a dagger!
Perhaps we can strike a kind of deal. I will tear your foes from this world. In return, you'll give me sweet pain!
Hey, do I have more orders yet?! It's torture waiting around without something to bleed!
Huh? This isn't an injury. I've simply bled myself as an offering! To who? Well, you, of course, Summoner.
Visit: I've gone well out of my way to come here. So take this. A greeting from [F].
Level: They're dying too quickly! We haven't even gotten to the fun part!
Ahaha! I can still feel it! The ecstasy of gutting my foes and spilling all their pretty insides!
What? Would you like more blood?! Haha! Then please, allow me to fight more!
Summon: I'm Griss, second-in-command of the Four Hounds. Would you like to hurt me? Or would you prefer I hurt you?
Learn Skill: More death? Haha! Oh, Summoner, you do give some good orders once in a while!
Confession:
Haha! I knew I'd like you. Killing with you, I see just how gloriously cruel you are, [S]!
Oh, no need to be shy. You order us to fight and suffer pain, all while healing us right at the brink of death!
Ha! How your Heroes have managed to cling to their sanity is impressive. Or, perhaps, they've already lost it!
Good thing you have me as the voice of reason. HAHA! Say... How great would it be if this war never ended?
Let them tear at me, but never allow me to die! Do that, and you and I can kill and be killed for eternity! AHAHA!
Status: *laugh*
If you really want to get to me, try a blade. Do you lack the courage to do that?
Oh, the great summoner is here? Shall I offer up my blood?
I'm dying of boredom. Say, is there a Hero you don't like? Why don't we murder them?
You wanna die without suffering? Don't be stupid! Pain that exquisite is worth feeling.
Promise you'll keep sending me into rigorous, gruesome battles... Got it, Summoner?
What am I to do alone in this soft world without Zephia?
You get a kick out of making Heroes battle, eh? As you wish...I'll fight covered in blood and drowning in anguish.
